translations: v．赞美，称赞：表示对某人或某事的钦佩、敬意或赞许。
· She complimented him on his excellent performance.
她称赞他的表现非常出色。

phrs.translation: 言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话

sentences.sentence: She complimented me on my English.
She complimented him on his excellent German.
They complimented me on the way I looked each time they saw me.
sentences.translation: 他们每次见到我都就我的外貌恭维我。
